genericPitch: I build full-stack applications and data-driven solutions backed by real metrics. Whether it's Go backends, Power BI dashboards, leading dev teams, or shipping under 24-hour hackathon deadlines, I focus on technical depth, fast learning, and getting things out the door.

highlights.label: Power Automate, Azure AD & SharePoint Integration
highlights.problem: Operational teams were manually reviewing time-series data with no automated way to flag anomalies or share forecasts
highlights.built: Analytics dashboard processing real North Sea data (7 wells) with ETS forecasting, 95% confidence intervals, and rolling z-score anomaly detection. Integrated Azure AD (OAuth2) and Microsoft Graph API for SharePoint file I/O with automatic token refresh, plus a Power Automate workflow for weekly report distribution via Outlook
highlights.tech: Python, Streamlit, Azure AD, Microsoft Graph API, Power Automate, SharePoint
highlights.impact: 45% lower MAE vs baseline, automated weekly email reporting replaced manual process, dual-mode architecture (cloud/local) for flexible deployment

highlights.label: CI/CD Pipelines & Agile Delivery
highlights.problem: A financial literacy platform needed someone to own front-end architecture and sort out API contracts between the front-end and back-end teams
highlights.built: Led requirements gathering through 2-3 Scrum meetings per week, defined API contracts with the back-end team, built a shared React component library across 5+ pages, and implemented a CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions running linting and tests on every PR
highlights.tech: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, GitHub Actions, CI/CD
highlights.impact: Accelerated feature delivery by 1-2 sprints, 30+ successful PR merges without regression, piloted with 100+ students across 2-3 schools

highlights.label: Secure Backend Development
highlights.problem: Web apps serving 1,000+ daily users needed tighter security without breaking anything for active users
highlights.built: Set up CORS policies, proxy configs, role-based access control, and SQL-based authentication. Also documented system workflows and contributed to internal SOPs for issue resolution and operations
highlights.impact: Zero security incidents during tenure, resolved 3 critical system bottlenecks, all deadlines met ahead of schedule

highlights.label: React, APIs & Full-Stack Development
highlights.problem: Co-founded a dev studio and needed to set up structured delivery practices to ship reliable products for university clubs
highlights.built: Led 4 developers through Agile sprints with Git-based code reviews, shipped login systems, dashboards, and responsive UIs, and wrote documentation and onboarding guides for new contributors
highlights.tech: React, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Git, REST APIs
highlights.impact: 100+ active users served, clean deployment pipeline, documentation enabled faster onboarding for new contributors

highlights.label: OOP, Java & Full-Stack Architecture
highlights.problem: Needed to demonstrate end-to-end software engineering across backend, web, and mobile with proper OOP design, testing discipline, and CI/CD
highlights.built: Full-stack incident management platform with a Spring Boot REST API (Strategy pattern escalation engine, JWT + RBAC), React + TypeScript dashboard, and Kotlin Android app with MVVM and offline-first caching. Configured Jenkins and GitHub Actions CI/CD pipelines
highlights.tech: Java, Spring Boot, React, TypeScript, Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, PostgreSQL, Docker, Jenkins
highlights.impact: 99 automated tests (JUnit 5 + Mockito), caught real production bugs during testing, 3-platform architecture from a single API

highlights.label: Data Analysis & KPI Reporting
highlights.problem: Operations teams had no centralized view of asset integrity KPIs, so prioritizing inspections and catching compliance gaps was mostly guesswork
highlights.built: Power BI dashboard with DAX measures, role-based views for engineers vs. managers, slicers by department/month/year, and compliance trend summaries for stakeholder reporting
highlights.tech: Power BI, DAX, Power Query, SQL Server, SharePoint
highlights.impact: 24 months of data modeled, backlog alerts enabled proactive planning, role-based access tailored insights per audience
